ticket.title: image_tag mouseout broken with Asset Server
ticket.original-body: Using an image tag such as: <%= image_tag("nav-home.gif", :size => "100x30", :mouseover => "nav-home-over.gif") %> when config.action_controller.asset_host = "http://localhost/media" is defined (for example), it breaks the onmousedown link. In this instance, the rendered HTML looks like: You can see the onmouseout.
ticket.latest-body: Using an image tag such as: <%= image_tag("nav-home.gif", :size => "100x30", :mouseover => "nav-home-over.gif") %> when config.action_controller.asset_host = "http://localhost/media" is defined (for example), it breaks the onmousedown link. In this instance, the rendered HTML looks like: You can see the onmouseout.
ticket.original-body-html:
Using an image tag such as:

<%= image_tag("nav-home.gif", :size => "100x30", :mouseover => "nav-home-over.gif") %>

when

config.action_controller.asset_host = "http://localhost/media"

is defined (for example), it breaks the onmousedown link.

In this instance, the rendered HTML looks like:

You can see the onmouseout.

version.body: Using an image tag such as: <%= image_tag("nav-home.gif", :size => "100x30", :mouseover => "nav-home-over.gif") %> when config.action_controller.asset_host = "http://localhost/media" is defined (for example), it breaks the onmousedown link. In this instance, the rendered onmouseout looks like: onmouseout="this.src='/images/http:%2F%2Flocalhost%2Fmedia%2Fimages%2Fnav-random.gif%3F1211937624'" onmouseover="this.src='/images/nav-random-over.gif'" You can see the onmouseout.
version.body-html:
Using an image tag such as:

<%= image_tag("nav-home.gif", :size => "100x30", :mouseover => "nav-home-over.gif") %>

when

config.action_controller.asset_host = "http://localhost/media"

is defined (for example), it breaks the onmousedown link.

In this instance, the rendered onmouseout looks like:

onmouseout="this.src='/images/http:%2F%2Flocalhost%2Fmedia%2Fimages%2Fnav-random.gif%3F1211937624'"

onmouseover="this.src='/images/nav-random-over.gif'"

You can see the onmouseout.
version.title: image_tag mouseout broken with Asset Server

version.body: I can't reproduce this on 2.1 or edge. I'm attaching a testcase which works for me, if possible please try to modify it to demonstrate the failure.
version.body-html: I can't reproduce this on 2.1 or edge. I'm attaching a testcase which works for me, if possible please try to modify it to demonstrate the failure.
version.title: image_tag mouseout broken with Asset Server
